version_description:
"Greetings from the Random Royale Team. It has recently come to our attention that some players are deliberately not starting the game during Party Mode.
We would like to ask you to please refrain from doing so since this negatively affects other players. Your account might be banned if we detect any repeated instances of this in the future. 
We are also planning to add a “Report” feature soon so that players can directly report this type of behavior.

[New Features]
1. Today's update adds the 'Dragon Orb' card, which transforms into a dragon after collecting 7 cards. This new card will make the gameplay much more exciting!
2. Added a new skin for the Heart card called 'Cupid heart'. Check it out at the store!

[Other Updates]
1. Changed the name of the 'Life' card to 'Heart'."

Greetings from the Random Royale Team.
Today's update adds the 'Bitcoin' card, which allows players to obtain big stars at a certain probability!
There is a whole lot to experience thanks to this new card, so don't miss out! 
 
[New Features]
1. The Winter event has just begun to celebrate the start of this magical season! Make sure to log into the game every day and participate! (The weekly event is still ongoing).
2. Special edition skins will be sold during the whole duration of the event, so don't forget to check out the store! (These skins can only be purchased while this event is ongoing).
3. Reconnecting mid-game is now possible. Added a new feature that allows players to re-join right away if the game disconnects due to a network issue. Players will now be able to enjoy the game in a more stable way and without losing their match.
4. Added a new feature that allows players to obtain party play tickets by watching ads.

[Balance correction]
1. There was a data error in the death card, so the 'instant death probability' has been corrected. Increase per level 4% → 0.4%.
2. The amount of crown obtained for the 'helmet' card has been changed. Fixed 1 → Random among '1 ~ Grade'.

Greetings from the Random Royale Team.
We deployed a hotfix today to address some bugs.

[Bug Fixes]
1. Fixed the Butcher card's displayed short-range attack power value.
2. Fixed an issue with some missing Space Control Tower card buffs.
3. Fixed an issue with some missing critical card buffs.

We would like to apologize for the confusion caused due to the explanation regarding the Butcher card's short-range attack power.
The displayed values and explanation were written in a misleading manner, so we have made the necessary modifications and displayed the exact value.
